projects.title: AngularQuiz
details: Engineered a full-stack quiz platform using Angular (frontend) and Flask (backend), supporting real-time
scoring, leaderboards, and secure authentication for 50+ concurrent users.
•Developed REST APIs in Flask and linked a relational database to manage 1,000+ quiz questions and user
scores.
•Enabled real-time competition, increasing engagement with live leaderboard updates every second.
•Deployed the application locally for testing and demonstration, gaining hands-on experience in client–server
architecture, authentication flows, and state management.

projects.title: Saneflii
details: Designed user registration, login, and personalized meal plan generation based on dietary preferences and
calorie limits.
•Built the frontend with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and backend with PHP, including session management for
secure authentication across 100+ test users.
•Devised a recommendation system to tailor meal plans to individual calorie goals, increasing user engagement
by ~25% during testing.

studies_training.degree: Computer Engineering Bachelor Degree: Embedded Systems and IoT

details: Created a full-stack web application for automated data extraction and import into
NeoXam’s software, reducing manual integration time by ~30%.
•Developed the frontend using React and backend with Django, leveraging SQLite
for efficient database management.
•Containerized and deployed the application on a production server using Docker,
ensuring 99% uptime and scalable access for the QA team.
•Boosted QA team efficiency by 20%, enabling faster responses and quicker bug
identification.
•Engineered an Android pedometer app for daily step tracking, integrated with a
smart shoe using Arduino Nano and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).
•Programmed the microcontroller in C via Arduino IDE and the mobile app in Java
and XML using Android Studio.
•Enabled real-time step data synchronization with Firebase for multiple users
simultaneously.
•Achieved step-count accuracy of ~95%, improving reliability for daily step tracking
and fitness monitoring.
